titleStmt.title: The third and last part of conny-catching With the new deuised knauish arte of foole-taking. The like coosnages and villanies neuer before discouered. / By R.G.
titleStmt.author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.
Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592. Notable discovery of coosenage.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Scarlet for C. Burby, and are to be solde at his shop vnder S. Mildreds Church in the Poultrie,

notesStmt.note: A sequel to his "A notable discovery of coosenage".
Identified as STC 12283 on UMI microfilm reel 385.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 385 and at reel 1817 (same copy filmed twice).

place.placeName: his shop vnder S. Mildreds Church in the Poultrie
